## PointerControllerOptions.onSelectDown property

Select button press event handler. like [mousedown](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/mousedown_event)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
onSelectDown?: (el: THREE.Object3D, point: THREE.Vector3) => void;
```
